Description:
Our client is looking for a Logistics Executive (Import & Export) to be based in Dubai, UAE.Duties and Responsibilities:Be in charge of the administration of contracts / orders and ensure their proper execution.
The Sales Administration Officer will handle the contract execution once the contract review has been finalized with the sales representatives. He/She will take care of the purchase order execution from Purchase Order placement up to invoicing and shipping document issuance.
Generate supplier orders previously prepared by sales representatives.
Ensure the proper execution of the terms specified in the contract review with each supplier
Follow very closely local and international suppliers
Ensure that delivery lead times are respected
Upon receipt of the goods, ensure the quality and conformity of the products
Prepare and issue export documentation
Send the notification of readiness/delivery to the customer
Send invoices to customers and ensure that they are received
Obtain proof of collection / delivery from the client or its forwarding agent to ensure the fluidity of client payments.
Manage and follow up any discrepancies (suppliers / customers)Skills
Skills:
Fluent in English
3 - 5 years experience as a Logistics Executive (Import & Export)
Previous professional experience in international sales administration
Previous professional experience abroad in a multicultural environment
Business degree with major in International Trade or Supply Chain
Very good knowledge of the office IT tools (Office + ERP system)
Excellent organization skills
Very good communicator
Business oriented
Dynamic, tenacious, autonomous, rigorous and proactive
Candidates who can start immediately will be highly desirable.

PO placement /execution
Very good knowledge of Incoterms
UAE Free Zone import/export procedures
Performing Quality Assurance/Quality Control (QA/QC) physically
